title: rangayya ninna
sahitya:
rangayya ninna yArenendarO


anupallavi

  sakala bhAgavataru gatitALa mELadinda taka kiTa kiTa taka dhimikendu kuNivAga


caraNam 1    sakkare cINi hAlina kene rasadinda ukkuva nore hAlanu medda krSNayya
    caraNam 2    drupadana magana sIreya sutti seLevAga krpeyinda akSayavitta dEvane ninna
    caraNam 3    jagadoDeya mUDalagiriya kOnEri timma agaNita mahima shrI purandara viTTala ninna
